A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi feels so drastically different from any other Star Wars film that it takes some time to get used to\, but once it settles it’s really great. It’s sometimes frustrating yet often satisfying. It’s overlong and with a weak plot\, but the movie rallies with rich emotion that satisfies in unexpected ways. It has great depth that’s ultimately fulfilling. Of course there’s so much more to say\, but without delving into spoilers\, this is a great movie that I loved quite a lot\, but it’s a step down from The Force Awakens.
